department.ch: 人力資源管理研究所碩士班

goal.en: Theories and practices are equally emphasized and integrated in this class in order to give an adequate foundation to strategic management. It covers the understanding and analysis of the internal and external business environment and apply the knowledge to strategy formulation and implementation to gain and sustain competitive advantage. Aside from lectures and reports, this course also employs a participative and case teaching method in which learning will be enhanced on class discussions about the key concepts of strategic management and the analysis of cases concerning the topics covered. Presentations, small group discussions, participation, and final exam are required.

content.en:
1 (2/21) Class Introduction
2 (2/28) No Classes – Peace Memorial Day
3 (3/6) Introduction to Strategy and Strategic Processes and Leadership
Suggested Reading: Heavey, C., Simsek, Z., Kyprianou, C., ＆ Risius, M. (2020). How do strategic leaders engage with social media? A theoretical framework for research and practice. Strategic Management Journal, 41(8), 1490-1527.
4 (3/13) External Analysis
Suggested Reading: Aggarwal, V. K., ＆ Reddie, A. W. (2022). New economic statecraft: Industrial policy in an era of strategic competition. In The Strategic Options of Middle Powers in the Asia-Pacific (pp. 105-122). Routledge.
5 (3/20) Case 1: Where’s the Beef? Beyond Meat, Impossible Foods, and the Alternative Meat Industry
6 (3/27) Internal Analysis
Suggested Reading: Collins, C. J. (2021). Expanding the resource based view model of strategic human resource management. The International Journal of Human Resource Management, 32(2), 331-358.
7 (4/3) Case 2: Boho Bars: Energizing Growth
8 (4/10) Competitive Advantage, Firm Performance, and Business Models
Suggested Reading: Geissdoerfer, M., Pieroni, M. P., Pigosso, D. C., ＆ Soufani, K. (2020). Circular business models: A review. Journal of Cleaner Production, 277, 123741.
9 (4/17) Differentiation, Cost Leadership, Blue Oceans
Suggested Reading: Amjad, M. S., Rafique, M. Z., Khan, M. A., Khan, A., ＆ Bokhari, S. F. (2022). Blue Ocean 4.0 for sustainability–harnessing Blue Ocean Strategy through Industry 4.0. Technology Analysis ＆ Strategic Management, 1-16.
10 (4/24) Innovation, Entrepreneurship, and Platforms
Suggested Reading: Fu, X., Li, Y., Li, J., ＆ Chesbrough, H. (2022). When do latecomer firms undertake international open innovation: Evidence from China. Global Strategy Journal, 12(1), 31-56.
11 (5/1) Case 3: Uvanart: Ready for a Blue Ocean Shift?
12 (5/8) Vertical Integration, and Diversification
Suggested Reading: Sambharya, R. B., ＆ Goll, I. (2021). Do international and product diversification strategies affect human rights and employee orientation disclosures? An across‐country empirical study of large multinational enterprises. Global Strategy Journal, 11(2), 245-268.
13 (5/15) Strategic Alliance, Mergers and Acquisitions
Suggested Reading: Zhu, D. H., ＆ Westphal, J. D. (2021). Structural power, corporate strategy, and performance. Strategic Management Journal, 42(3), 624-651.
14 (5/22) Case 4: Microsoft Acquires Activision Blizzard: Beating Sony in Gaming and the Metaverse
15 (5/29) Global Strategy
Suggested Reading: Asmussen, C. G., ＆ Foss, N. J. (2022). Strategizing and economizing in global strategy. Global Strategy Journal, 12(3), 578-591.
16 (6/5) Final Exam
